comment: Auto-tuning sweep configuration for refining jitter/fragmentation/misalignment/empty-box issues

params.name: foreground_dbscan_eps
params.description: Clustering radius for foreground points. Affects fragmentation.

params.name: foreground_min_cluster_points
params.description: Minimum points per cluster. Affects noise rejection vs. detection.

params.name: gating_distance_squared
params.description: Association gate radius squared. Affects fragmentation and re-association.

params.name: measurement_noise
params.description: Observation uncertainty. Affects heading jitter and position responsiveness.

params.name: process_noise_vel
params.description: Velocity process noise. Affects speed jitter and velocity-trail alignment.

params.name: closeness_multiplier
params.description: Background acceptance bandwidth. Affects empty boxes and foreground capture.

params.name: safety_margin_meters
params.description: Fixed margin for background classification. Affects edge point capture.

notes: This sweep configuration targets the key parameters affecting:
The objective weights heavily penalise fragmentation (-5.0) and empty boxes (-3.0),
moderately penalise jitter (-2.0 each), and reward foreground capture (+1.0).
Acceptance criteria reject any combo with fragmentation > 20% or empty boxes > 12%.
